/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX12.0.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/sdl_player.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sdl_player.dir/player.cpp.o -o sdl_player   -L/usr/local/lib  -L/usr/local/ffmpeg/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/ffmpeg/lib -lavcodec -lavdevice -lavfilter -lavformat -lavutil -lswresample -lswscale -lSDL2
